name: Fish'o'gram
description:
Description 📖

You need to take photos of marine life, and then upload them to the fish’o’gram, getting money for it. In the store, with the money received, you can buy a new bathyscaphe to dive deeper and deeper, exploring new unknown species of sea creatures.

HOW TO PLAY 🎮

You can move batiscaphe using WASD buttons and take photo by pressing your SPACE button You can view your photos in the gallery on your phone and then sell them to get money. Note that your signal strength must be high enough to upload photos. Better photos of rarer creatures will give you more money!

Get full collection in your bestiarium. Good luck!
